doc.name: input-url
doc.description: An URL input field will be checked by the browser for a valid url input.
doc.parameters:
type="url"

All attributes for an url input are supported (like in this case : name. required and placeholder).
doc.example:
<wsfield type="url" name="urlfield" placeholder="Type your website address" required="required" /> 
All attributes for an url input are supported (like in this case : name. required and placeholder).
